Class CumulativeLengthOfStayHospital

java.lang.Object
de.ukbonn.mwtek.dashboardlogic.logic.cumulative.lengthofstay.CumulativeLengthOfStayHospital
public class CumulativeLengthOfStayHospital extends Object
This class is used for generating the data items cumulative.lengthofstay.hospital and the sub items

  • Method Details

    • createMapDaysHospitalList

      public HashMap<String,Map<Long,List<String>>> createMapDaysHospitalList()
      Creates a map with the time in days that patients have spent as inpatients in hospital

      Used for cumulative.lengthofstay.hospital

      Returns:
      A map with the pid as key and the value is a map containing the information on how many days a patient has spent in the hospital, and how often he was there, shown by the number of casesIds

    • createLengthOfStayHospitalByVitalstatus

      public HashMap<String,Map<Long,List<String>>> createLengthOfStayHospitalByVitalstatus(List<de.ukbonn.mwtek.utilities.fhir.resources.UkbEncounter> listEncounters, HashMap<String,Map<Long,List<String>>> mapDays, String vitalStatus)
      Calculates the amount of time in days, a patient stayed in the hospital

      Used for cumulative.lengthofstay.hospital.alive and cumulative.lengthofstay.hospital.dead

      Parameters:
      listEncounters - A list with UkbEncounter resources
      mapDays - An already created map that assigns a length of stay to patient Ids
      vitalStatus - Criteria whether it should be searched for details of deceased/alive patients
      Returns:
      A Map linking a patientid to a map that containing the length of stay in the hospital and all the caseids from which this total was calculated
